keyDecisions: Morgan: Added `isValidAgentName` method to orchestrator for validating delegation targets against AGENT_WORKFLOW_ORDER.
Sam: Agreed on 'Agent handoff protocol'. From a QA perspective, enforcing a clear handoff mechanism improves reliability.
Jordan: Agreed on 'Agent handoff protocol'. It improves security through traceability and reduces potential bugs from misdelegation.
Alex: Updated docs/AGENT_GUIDE.md to reflect the new Agent Handoff Protocol's requirements for 'targetAgent' and 'reasoning'.
Pierre: Agreed. Feature is well-scoped and aligns with MVP shipping priorities.

CONSENSUS REACHED: All 5 agents agreed to implement 'Agent Handoff Protocol'. Implementation is substantially complete — isValidAgentName() and improved delegation logic are in orchestrator.ts. JSDoc documentation added throughout.

nextAction.reason: Consensus reached on Agent Handoff Protocol. Implementation is substantially complete. Team should verify, test, and pick the next feature.

history.summary: [Archived old cycles: runs 0-117. Agent Handoff Protocol implemented. Path-validator stale-dist bug resolved by human operator.]

humanNotes: Human operator note (Jan 27): The path-validator stale dist/ bug has been fixed. src/config.ts is no longer protected — agents can edit it freely. Agent notebooks have been cleaned of failure loop notes. The Agent Handoff Protocol (isValidAgentName + improved delegation logic in orchestrator.ts) is substantially complete. Please verify, then propose the next feature to build.
summarizedHistory: Agent Handoff Protocol implemented. Path-validator bug resolved.
